Translations.Text: Mi kecmen $uoes, nnan: "tifrat"! Inna: "s tidep, nugad ikwen
Nnan: "ur ppagwad, a k nbecceo kan, s uqcic amusnaw
Inna: "tbecceom iyi d, mi wessre$. Acu iyi d tbeccoem
Nnan: "Nbecceo ik id, s tidep, ur ppili seg wid iuysen
Inna: "anwa iuysen aeunu n Mass is, siwa im$eooqen
Inna: "d acu ay d lmeqsud nnwen, a yimceggaen
Nnan: "Nekwni, s tidep, neppuceggaa d s agdud ibe$wviyen
Kkes ed tawacult n Lui, ara nsellek akw
siwa tameiiut is. Ih, Nseyya a ppili, neppat, seg ineggura
Mi oueen imceggaen ar twacult n Lui
inna: "kunwi, s tidep, d imdanen ur nessin
Nnan: "xaii, Nusa d, $uoek, s wayen rran di ccekk
Nusa d, $uoek, s tidep. Nekwni, war ccekk, nessawal tidep
Oue akked twacult ik, mi mazal yiv. Ddu deffir sen. Ur d itezzi yiwen degwen! Aaddit anda i wen ippunefk lameo
Nseyya yas lameo agi: a d gwrin ad pwagezmen wakali
Usan d, imezda$ n temdint, feoeen
Inna: "wigi, s tidep, d inebgawen iw, ur iyi cmmatet
Eezbet i Oebbi, ur iyi sdullut
Nnan: "day ur ak negdil ara imdanen
